Service Details

Everything you need to know about our services

Our Complete Service Offering

CloudKitchen provides comprehensive food solutions designed to meet every need, from individual meals to large-scale catering events.

Food Delivery Service

Our flagship delivery service brings restaurant-quality meals directly to your doorstep with unmatched speed and reliability.

Delivery Information:

  • Delivery Time: 30-45 minutes average
  • Delivery Hours: 24/7 service available
  • Delivery Area: City-wide coverage with expanding zones
  • Minimum Order: $15 for free delivery
  • Delivery Fee: $2.99 for orders under $30

Order Options:

  • Website ordering with real-time tracking
  • Mobile app for on-the-go ordering
  • Phone orders for traditional customers
  • Scheduled orders up to 7 days in advance

Catering Service

Professional catering solutions for events of all sizes, from intimate gatherings to large corporate functions.

Catering Options:

  • Corporate Events: Business meetings, conferences, office parties
  • Social Events: Birthdays, anniversaries, family gatherings
  • Weddings: Full-service wedding catering packages
  • Special Occasions: Holiday parties, celebrations

Service Features:

  • Custom menu development
  • Professional serving staff
  • Equipment rental and setup
  • Cleanup services included
  • Dietary accommodations (vegetarian, vegan, gluten-free)

Frequently Asked Questions

What are your delivery times?

Standard delivery time is 30-45 minutes from order confirmation. During peak hours (12-2 PM, 6-8 PM), delivery may take up to 60 minutes. You can track your order in real-time through our app.

How do you ensure food hygiene and safety?

We follow strict food safety protocols including regular kitchen sanitization, temperature monitoring, food handler certifications, and sealed packaging. All our kitchens are certified by local health departments.

What payment methods do you accept?

We accept all major credit/debit cards, digital wallets (Apple Pay, Google Pay), net banking, and cash on delivery. Corporate accounts can also set up monthly billing.

What is your cancellation policy?

Orders can be cancelled within 5 minutes of placement for full refund. For scheduled orders, cancellations must be made at least 2 hours before delivery time. Meal plans can be paused or cancelled with 24-hour notice.

Do you deliver to my area?

We currently deliver to all major areas within the city limits. You can check delivery availability by entering your address on our website or app. We're constantly expanding our service areas.

Can I accommodate dietary restrictions?

Absolutely! We offer extensive options for vegetarian, vegan, gluten-free, dairy-free, and other dietary restrictions. You can specify preferences when ordering, and our team will ensure proper preparation.

Our Service Guarantees
